original: intros net h d t out l H_ref H_timeout H_candT H_candT_upd. unfold candidateEntriesTerm in *. unfold handleTimeout in H_timeout. destruct (nwState net h) as [sigma_d sigma]. simpl in *. specialize (H_candT t sigma). destruct H_candT as [h' [Helected [Hcurrent Htype]]]. exists h'. split; [|split]. - auto. - intros HcurrentTerm Htype_eq. apply Helected. apply (H_candT_upd h' Hcurrent). auto.
